import React, { useReducer } from 'react' import './styles.css' import { todoReducer } from './todoReducer' const initialState = [{ id: new Date().getTime(), descripcion: "Aprender React", done: false }] export const TodoApp = () => { const [todos] = useReducer(todoReducer, initialState) console.log(todos); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); console.log("Nueva tarea") const newTodo = { id: new Date().getTime(), descripcion: "Aprender React", done: false } } return (

TodoApp ({todos.length})

  • {i + 1}. {todo.descripcion}
